content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully established. Multiple attempts were made to deploy a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) to serve as a research facility for supplying Automation Science Packs; however, placement and crafting of the Lab failed due to inventory shortages and missing required sub-ingredients. Although existing furnaces (an iron smelting furnace at (5.0, 5.0) and a copper furnace at (–27.0, –60.0)) were retrieved for smelting operations, no new agent‐constructed structures are present on the map.

ERROR TIPS
• API Parameter Mismatch in get_entities Calls
  – Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) and using excess positional arguments. Always match the function’s defined parameter signature.
  
• Handling None Returns from Entity Retrieval
  – Check for a None value before iterating over the result from get_entities. Use a fallback (for example, an empty list) to prevent “NoneType object is not iterable” errors.
  
• Lab Placement and Crafting Failures
  – Confirm the Lab is available in the inventory before attempting placement.
  – Ensure that all prerequisite materials (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables, etc.) are produced in sufficient quantities prior to crafting a Lab.
  
• Resource Insufficiency for Complex Recipes
  – Strengthen the resource production pipeline so that raw materials (iron-plate, copper-plate, etc.) and intermediate components are available to meet the requirements for advanced crafting recipes such as the Lab.
